AT.name: Pikmin™
AT.description: Das als Action - Strategie angekündigte Pikmin ist ein Action-Strategiespiel mit unglaublich lebensechten Umgebungen, die durch Mr. Miyamotos eigenen Garten in Kyoto (Japan) angeregt wurden.Der Spieler übernimmt einen Raumfahrer namens Captain Olimar, der auf einem ungewöhnlichen Planeten notlanden musste. Das Ziel des Spiels besteht darin, Olimar bei der Suche nach den Teilen seines Raumschiffs zu helfen, die über den ganzen Planeten verstreut sind. Zum Glück für Captain Olimar ist der Planet von seltsamen kleinen Wesen bewohnt, den Pikmin. Pikmin sind pflanzenartige Lebensformen, die in drei verschiedenen Farben vorkommen: Rot, gelb und blau. Jeder Pikmin-Typ hat ganz eigene Stärken, die Olimar zu seinem Vorteil nutzen muss. Rote Pikmin sind unempfindlich gegen Feuer, blaue Pikmin können im Wasser überleben, gelbe Pikmin dagegen können Hindernisse mit Bomben-Steinen zerstören. Der Spieler kann die Pikmin-Sprosse einzeln, in Gruppen oder als große Pikmin-Schar von 100 Wesen steuern.Anders als in vielen Strategiespielen ist die Steuerung in Pikmin sehr einfach. In der "NEW PLAY CONTROL!"-Reihe von Nintendo werden Nintendo GameCube-Klassiker für Wii neu überarbeitet! Neue Spielelemente, neue Erlebnisse und vor allem neue Steuerungsmöglichkeiten erwarten Sie - ob Sie die Titel noch nicht kennen, oder schon die GameCube-Originale gespielt haben. Bei "NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin" wurde vor allem die Zielsteuerung verändert. Im GameCube-Original bewegte Olimar den Zielsucher immer mit sich, was das Zielen dann erschwerte, wenn es um jede Sekunde ging. Aber in "NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin" ist das Zielen besonders leicht, denn dafür zeigt man einfach mit der Wii-Fernbedienung auf den Bildschirm. Dadurch ist es nicht nur leichter, den Zielsucher zu bewegen, sondern den Spielern wird auch eine Präzision geboten, die vorher nicht möglich war. Auch der Nunchuk-Controller wird zum Spielen verwendet, da man Olimars Bewegungen mit dem Control Stick steuert. Die meisten Pikmin-Bewegungen und Befehle werden mit der Wii-Fernbedienung ausgeführt.

AU.name: Pikmin™
AU.description: Referred to as an "inventive life simulation," Pikmin is an action-strategy game featuring incredibly lifelike environments inspired by Mr. Miyamoto's own garden in Kyoto, Japan. Players control a spaceman named Captain Olimar, who has crash-landed on an unusual planet. The goal of the game is to help Olimar collect his vessel's lost parts, which have been scattered all over the planet. Luckily for Captain Olimar, the planet is inhabited by strange little creatures called Pikmin. Pikmin are plant-like life forms that come in three different colours: red, yellow and blue. Each type of Pikmin has unique strengths, which Olimar must use to his advantage. Red Pikmin can withstand fire, blue Pikmin can survive in water, while yellow Pikmin can destroy obstacles by using bomb rocks. Players can control the Pikmin sprouts individually, in groups, or in one large Pikmin posse of 100 creatures. The NEW PLAY CONTROL! series from Nintendo features Nintendo GameCube classics updated for Wii! New features, new experiences and, most importantly, new ways to control the games await, whether you’re new to the titles or have played the originals on GameCube. For NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, the biggest control change concerns targeting. In the GameCube original, Olimar’s target moved where he moved, which made for some difficult aiming when precious seconds mattered. But with NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, targeting is as easy as pointing at the screen with the Wii Remote. Using the pointer capabilities of the controller not only makes it easier to move the target cursor, it gives players a precision that they could not experience previously. The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

Pikmin, the biggest control change concerns targeting. In the GameCube original, Olimar’s target moved where he moved, which made for some difficult aiming when precious seconds mattered. The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

BE.name: Pikmin™
BE.description: Qualifié de "simulation de vie inventive", Pikmin est un jeu d'action et de stratégie prèsentant des environnements incroyablement vivants inspirés par le propre jardin de M. Miyamoto, à Kyoto, au Japon. Les joueurs contrôlent un astronaute, le capitaine Olimar, dont le vaisseau s'est écrasé sur une étrange planète. Le but du jeu est d'aider Olimar à remettre la main sur les pièces de son vaisseau éparpillées sur toute la planète. Heureusement pour le capitaine Olimar, cette planète est habitée par de curieuses petites créatures appelées Pikmin. Les Pikmin sont des formes de vie de type végétal existant en trois couleurs : rouge, jaune et bleue. Chaque type de Pikmin possède ses propres caractéristiques qu'Olimar pourra exploiter à son profit. Les Pikmin rouges résistent au feu, les Pikmin bleus peuvent survivre dans l'eau et les Pikmin jaunes peuvent détruire les obstacles en utilisant des cailloux-bombes. Le joueur peut contrôler les Pikmin individuellement, en groupe ou même en un vaste ensemble de 100 créatures. La série NOUVELLE FAÇON DE JOUER ! de Nintendo propose des classiques Nintendo GameCube adaptés sur Wii ! De nouvelles fonctions, de nouvelles expériences et surtout de nouvelles façons de contrôler les jeux vous attendent, que vous ayez joué aux jeux sur GameCube ou non. Dans Pikmin NOUVELLE FAÇON DE JOUER !, le plus grand changement dans les commandes concerne la visée. Dans le jeu GameCube, la cible d'Olimar le suivait, ce qui rendait la visée difficile alors que chaque seconde est précieuse. Mais avec Pikmin NOUVELLE FAÇON DE JOUER !, viser est aussi facile que de pointer l'écran avec la télécommande Wii. Grâce aux capacités de la manette, vous déplacez facilement le curseur de visée et obtenez une précision inégalée. Le Nunchuk est aussi utilisé dans le jeu car vous déplacez Olimar via le Stick directionnel, tandis que la plupart des mouvements et ordres donnés aux Pikmin se font via la télécommande Wii.

The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

ES.name: Pikmin™
ES.description: Definido como una "simulación ingeniosa de la vida", Pikmin es un juego de acción y estrategia en el que aparecen los impresionantes entornos inspirados en el jardín del propio Miyamoto en Kyoto, Japón. Los jugadores controlan a un astronauta llamado Capitán Olimar que ha chocado con su nave en un planeta poco común. El objetivo del juego consiste en ayudar a Olimar a reunir las piezas perdidas de su nave que han quedado esparcidas por todo el planeta. Por suerte para el Capitán Olimar, el planeta está habitado por extrañas criaturitas llamadas Pikmin. Los Pikmin son formas de vida similares a las plantas, de tres colores: rojo, amarillo y azul. Cada tipo de Pikmin tiene un punto fuerte distinto que Olimar debe aprovechar. Los Pikmin rojos soportan el fuego, los azules pueden sobrevivir en el agua y los amarillos destruyen obstáculos con rocas-bomba. El jugador puede controlar a los brotes Pikmin de forma individual, en grupos o formando una figura grande Pikmin compuesta por 100 criaturas. La serie NEW PLAY CONTROL! de Nintendo rescata clásicos de Nintendo GameCube actualizados para su uso en Wii. Te esperan nuevas funciones, experiencias y, lo que es más importante, un flamante sistema de control, ya juegues por primera vez o hayas disfrutado de las versiones originales. En este NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, el cambio más sustancial por lo que concierne al sistema de control radica en el acto de apuntar. En el juego original, el blanco se movía al compás de Olimar, lo cual hacía harto difícil apuntar cuando la situación era apremiante. Pero en este NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, no tienes más que apuntar con el mando de Wii. Las propiedades del puntero integrado no solo facilitan el movimiento del cursor, sino que brinda a los jugadores una precisión nunca vista. El Nunchuk también se utiliza para este juego: su palanca de control determina los movimientos de Olimar, mientras que la mayoría de acciones de los Pikmin se realizan mediante el mando de Wii.

Using the pointer capabilities of the controller not only makes it easier to move the target cursor, it gives players a precision that they could not experience previously. The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

HR.name: Pikmin™
HR.description: Referred to as an "inventive life simulation," Pikmin is an action-strategy game featuring incredibly lifelike environments inspired by Mr. Miyamoto's own garden in Kyoto, Japan. Players control a spaceman named Captain Olimar, who has crash-landed on an unusual planet. The goal of the game is to help Olimar collect his vessel's lost parts, which have been scattered all over the planet. Luckily for Captain Olimar, the planet is inhabited by strange little creatures called Pikmin. Pikmin are plant-like life forms that come in three different colours: red, yellow and blue. Each type of Pikmin has unique strengths, which Olimar must use to his advantage. Red Pikmin can withstand fire, blue Pikmin can survive in water, while yellow Pikmin can destroy obstacles by using bomb rocks. Players can control the Pikmin sprouts individually, in groups, or in one large Pikmin posse of 100 creatures. The NEW PLAY CONTROL! series from Nintendo features Nintendo GameCube classics updated for Wii! New features, new experiences and, most importantly, new ways to control the games await, whether you’re new to the titles or have played the originals on GameCube. For NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, the biggest control change concerns targeting. In the GameCube original, Olimar’s target moved where he moved, which made for some difficult aiming when precious seconds mattered. The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

IT.name: Pikmin™
IT.description: Definito innovativa simulazione di vita, Pikmin è un gioco di azione/strategia con ambienti incredibilmente realistici ispirati dal giardino di Kyoto di Mr. Miyamoto. I giocatori controllano il capitano Olimar, un astronauta che ha fatto un atterraggio di fortuna su un insolito pianeta. L'obiettivo del gioco è aiutare Olimar a raccogliere i pezzi della sua nave spaziale, che si sono sparsi su tutto il pianeta. Fortunatamente per il capitano Olimar, il pianeta è abitato da strani esserini, chiamati Pikmin. I Pikmin sono forme di vita simili a piante, di tre diversi colori: rosso, giallo e azzurro. Ogni tipo di Pikmin ha una diversa caratteristica, che Olimar deve utilizzare a suo vantaggio; i Pikmin rossi sono resistenti al fuoco, i Pikmin azzurri possono sopravvivere nell'acqua e i Pikmin gialli possono distruggere gli ostacoli servendosi di pietre-bombe. I giocatori possono controllare i germogli Pikmin individuali, o i gruppi, o le grandi squadre formate da 100 Pikmin. La serie NEW PLAY CONTROL! di Nintendo comprende titoli classici per Nintendo GameCube rielaborati per il Wii! Ti aspettano nuove funzioni, nuove esperienze e, soprattutto, nuove modalità di comando del gioco. Resterai affascinato da queste nuove versioni, anche se sei un affezionato delle versioni originali per GameCube. Per NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin per Wii, il principale cambiamento nei comandi riguarda il modo di mirare. Nell'originale per GameCube, il mirino seguiva Olimar, rendendo difficoltosa la mira, soprattutto quando il tempo era scarso. Ma con NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, mirare è semplicissimo, basta puntare lo schermo con il telecomando Wii. Grazie alle capacità di puntamento del controller, è più facile muovere il cursore del mirino, per ottenere una precisione maggiore rispetto alla versione precedente. In questo gioco si usa anche il Nunchuk, infatti i movimenti di Olimar sono determinati dal control stick del Nunchuk e gran parte dei movimenti dei Pikmin e degli ordini sono impartiti dal telecomando Wii.

The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

LU.name: Pikmin™
LU.description: Qualifié de "simulation de vie inventive", Pikmin est un jeu d'action et de stratégie prèsentant des environnements incroyablement vivants inspirés par le propre jardin de M. Miyamoto, à Kyoto, au Japon. Les joueurs contrôlent un astronaute, le capitaine Olimar, dont le vaisseau s'est écrasé sur une étrange planète. Le but du jeu est d'aider Olimar à remettre la main sur les pièces de son vaisseau éparpillées sur toute la planète. Heureusement pour le capitaine Olimar, cette planète est habitée par de curieuses petites créatures appelées Pikmin. Les Pikmin sont des formes de vie de type végétal existant en trois couleurs : rouge, jaune et bleue. Chaque type de Pikmin possède ses propres caractéristiques qu'Olimar pourra exploiter à son profit. Les Pikmin rouges résistent au feu, les Pikmin bleus peuvent survivre dans l'eau et les Pikmin jaunes peuvent détruire les obstacles en utilisant des cailloux-bombes. Le joueur peut contrôler les Pikmin individuellement, en groupe ou même en un vaste ensemble de 100 créatures. La série NOUVELLE FAÇON DE JOUER ! de Nintendo propose des classiques Nintendo GameCube adaptés sur Wii ! De nouvelles fonctions, de nouvelles expériences et surtout de nouvelles façons de contrôler les jeux vous attendent, que vous ayez joué aux jeux sur GameCube ou non. Dans Pikmin NOUVELLE FAÇON DE JOUER !, le plus grand changement dans les commandes concerne la visée. Dans le jeu GameCube, la cible d'Olimar le suivait, ce qui rendait la visée difficile alors que chaque seconde est précieuse. Mais avec Pikmin NOUVELLE FAÇON DE JOUER !, viser est aussi facile que de pointer l'écran avec la télécommande Wii. Grâce aux capacités de la manette, vous déplacez facilement le curseur de visée et obtenez une précision inégalée. Le Nunchuk est aussi utilisé dans le jeu car vous déplacez Olimar via le Stick directionnel, tandis que la plupart des mouvements et ordres donnés aux Pikmin se font via la télécommande Wii.

MT.name: Pikmin™
MT.description: Referred to as an "inventive life simulation," Pikmin is an action-strategy game featuring incredibly lifelike environments inspired by Mr. Miyamoto's own garden in Kyoto, Japan. NO.name: Pikmin™
NO.description: Referred to as an "inventive life simulation," Pikmin is an action-strategy game featuring incredibly lifelike environments inspired by Mr. Miyamoto's own garden in Kyoto, Japan. Players control a spaceman named Captain Olimar, who has crash-landed on an unusual planet. The NEW PLAY CONTROL! series from Nintendo features Nintendo GameCube classics updated for Wii! Pikmin, the biggest control change concerns targeting. In the GameCube original, Olimar’s target moved where he moved, which made for some difficult aiming when precious seconds mattered. But with NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, targeting is as easy as pointing at the screen with the Wii Remote. Using the pointer capabilities of the controller not only makes it easier to move the target cursor, it gives players a precision that they could not experience previously. The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

NL.name: Pikmin™
NL.description: Pikmin wordt omschreven als "creatieve levenssimulatie" en is een actie-/strategiegame met ongelofelijk realistische omgevingen die zijn gebaseerd op de tuin van Mr. Miyamoto in het Japanse Kyoto. Spelers besturen een ruimtevaarder, Kapitein Olimar, die is neergestort op een wel heel bijzondere planeet. Doel van de game is Olimar te helpen bij het opsporen van allerlei onderdelen van zijn ruimteschip, die over de hele planeet verspreid liggen. Kapitein Olimar heeft mazzel: op de planeet blijken vreemde wezentjes te wonen, die Pikmin heten. Pikmin zijn plantachtige levensvormen in drie kleuren: rood, geel en blauw. Elk type Pikmin heeft unieke eigenschappen, waarvan Olimar moet zien te profiteren. Rode Pikmin zijn bestand tegen vuur, blauwe Pikmin kunnen overleven in het water en gele Pikmin kunnen obstakels uit de weg ruimen met explosieve stenen. Je kunt de Pikmin individueel, in groepen of in één grote Pikmin-ploeg van 100 wezens besturen. De NEW PLAY CONTROL!-reeks van Nintendo bevat Nintendo GameCube-klassiekers die vernieuwd zijn voor de Wii! Met nieuwe eigenschappen, nieuwe ervaringen en, vooral, nieuwe manieren om de spellen te besturen. Zowel voor nieuwkomers als voor diegenen die de originelen hebben gespeeld op de GameCube. Voor NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin is de grootste verandering in de besturing het mikken. In het GameCube-origineel verplaatste Olimars doelwit zich waar Olimar ging, waardoor het af en toe lastig mikken was als elke seconde telde. Maar met NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin is mikken een kwestie van naar het scherm wijzen met de Wii-afstandsbediening. De aanwijsmogelijkheid van de controller maakt het niet alleen makkelijker om de doelcursor te bewegen, het geeft je ook een ongekende precisie. De Nunchuk-controller wordt ook gebruikt in dit spel, waarbij Olimars bewegingen bepaald worden met de richtingsstick van de Nunchuk en de meeste Pikmin-bewegingen en commando's gegeven worden met de Wii-afstandsbediening.

NZ.name: Pikmin™
NZ.description: Referred to as an "inventive life simulation," Pikmin is an action-strategy game featuring incredibly lifelike environments inspired by Mr. Miyamoto's own garden in Kyoto, Japan. PL.name: Pikmin™
PL.description: Referred to as an "inventive life simulation," Pikmin is an action-strategy game featuring incredibly lifelike environments inspired by Mr. Miyamoto's own garden in Kyoto, Japan. Players control a spaceman named Captain Olimar, who has crash-landed on an unusual planet. The goal of the game is to help Olimar collect his vessel's lost parts, which have been scattered all over the planet. Luckily for Captain Olimar, the planet is inhabited by strange little creatures called Pikmin. Pikmin are plant-like life forms that come in three different colours: red, yellow and blue. Each type of Pikmin has unique strengths, which Olimar must use to his advantage. Red Pikmin can withstand fire, blue Pikmin can survive in water, while yellow Pikmin can destroy obstacles by using bomb rocks. Players can control the Pikmin sprouts individually, in groups, or in one large Pikmin posse of 100 creatures. The NEW PLAY CONTROL! series from Nintendo features Nintendo GameCube classics updated for Wii! New features, new experiences and, most importantly, new ways to control the games await, whether you’re new to the titles or have played the originals on GameCube. For NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, the biggest control change concerns targeting. In the GameCube original, Olimar’s target moved where he moved, which made for some difficult aiming when precious seconds mattered. But with NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, targeting is as easy as pointing at the screen with the Wii Remote. Using the pointer capabilities of the controller not only makes it easier to move the target cursor, it gives players a precision that they could not experience previously. The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.

PT.name: Pikmin™
PT.description: Pikmin é um jogo de ação e estratégia descrito como um "engenhoso simulador da vida real", onde se podem encontrar ambientes extremamente realistas inspirados no jardim do Sr. Miyamoto, em Quioto, no Japão. Os jogadores controlam um astronauta, o Capitão Olimar, cuja nave espacial se despenhou num planeta muito invulgar. O objetivo do jogo consiste em ajudar Olimar a reunir as peças da sua nave espacial, que estão perdidas e espalhadas por todo o planeta. Felizmente para o Capitão Olimar, o planeta é habitado por estranhas criaturas chamadas Pikmin. Os Pikmin são pequenas formas de vida semelhantes a plantas, que existem em três cores diferentes: vermelho, amarelo e azul. Cada tipo de Pikmin tem atributos únicos que Olimar deve explorar em seu benefício. Os Pikmin vermelhos são resistentes ao fogo, os Pikmin azuis sobrevivem na água, e os Pikmin amarelos conseguem destruir obstáculos usando bomb rocks (pedras bomba). Os jogadores podem controlar os rebentos de Pikmin individualmente, em grupos, ou num batalhão de 100 Pikmin. A série NEW PLAY CONTROL! Da Nintendo apresenta os clássicos da Nintendo GameCube adaptados à Wii. Esperam-te novas funções, experiências e ainda mais importante, novas formas de controlar os jogos, quer sejas um principiante ou já tenhas jogado os originais na GameCube. Neste NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, a mudança mais substancial diz respeito ao apontar. No original da GameCube o alvo de Olimar movia-se na mesma direcção que ele, o que tornava a pontaria complicada quando se tratava de uma questão de segundos. Mas com o NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, apontar é tão fácil como apontar para o ecrã com o Comando Remoto Wii. Através das capacidades do ponteiro do comando não só é mais fácil movimentar o cursor do alvo, como fornece aos jogadores uma precisão que eles não experienciaram anteriormente. O comando Nunchuk também é utilizado para jogar este jogo, com a maioria dos movimentos de Olimar a serem determinados pelo Manípulo de Controlo do Nunchuk e a maioria dos movimentos e ordens dos Pikmin a ficarem a cargo do Comando Remoto Wii.

RU.name: Pikmin™
RU.description: Непростую стратегическую экшен-игру Pikmin, в которой присутствуют невероятно реалистичные пейзажи, созданные по образу сада господина Миямото в Киото (Япония), называют «изобретательной симуляцией жизни». Игроки управляют космонавтом по имени Captain Olimar (капитан Олимар), который совершил аварийную посадку на необычной планете. Цель игры — помочь Olimar (Олимару) собрать потерянные части своего корабля, которые были разбросаны по всей планете. К счастью для самого Captain Olimar (капитана Олимара), эту планету населяют странные маленькие существа под названием Pikmin (пикмины). Эти Pikmin (пикмины) – представители растительной формы жизни, которые имеют три разных цветовых окраса: красный, желтый и синий. Каждый вид Pikmin (пикминов) имеет уникальные преимущества, которые Olimar (Олимар) должен использовать в своих интересах. Красные Pikmin (пикмины) устойчивы к огню, синие Pikmin (пикмины) — к воде, в то время как желтые Pikmin (пикмины) могут разрушать преграды с помощью взрывающихся камней. Игроки могут управлять ростками Pikmin (пикминов) индивидуально, в группах или одним большим отрядом из 100 Pikmin (пикминов). Набор игр из серии NEW PLAY CONTROL! включает в себя классические игры Nintendo для системы GameCube, обновленные для использования на системе Wii! Новые функции, ощущения и, что важнее всего, новые способы управления играми придутся по вкусу, как новичкам, так и тем, кто уже играл в оригинальные игры на системе GameCube. В NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin самое заметное изменение в управлении — это прицеливание. В оригинальной игре для системы GameCube, мишень Olimar (Олимара) передвигалась в том же направлении, что и он, придавая игре излишнюю сложность. Но в NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin все, что нужно для прицеливания, это направить пульт Wii на желаемый участок экрана. Возможности указателя контроллера предоставляют не только более удобный способ управления мишенью, но и придают ему уровень точности, достичь который ранее было просто невозможно. Контроллер Nunchuk также можно использовать в этой игре, управляя Olimar (Олимаром) с помощью мини-джойстика контроллера Nunchuk. А для большинства приказов и движений Pikmin (пикминов) можно использовать пульт Wii.

SE.name: Pikmin™
SE.description: Referred to as an "inventive life simulation," Pikmin is an action-strategy game featuring incredibly lifelike environments inspired by Mr. Miyamoto's own garden in Kyoto, Japan. Players control a spaceman named Captain Olimar, who has crash-landed on an unusual planet. The goal of the game is to help Olimar collect his vessel's lost parts, which have been scattered all over the planet. Luckily for Captain Olimar, the planet is inhabited by strange little creatures called Pikmin. Pikmin are plant-like life forms that come in three different colours: red, yellow and blue. Each type of Pikmin has unique strengths, which Olimar must use to his advantage. Red Pikmin can withstand fire, blue Pikmin can survive in water, while yellow Pikmin can destroy obstacles by using bomb rocks. Players can control the Pikmin sprouts individually, in groups, or in one large Pikmin posse of 100 creatures. The NEW PLAY CONTROL! series from Nintendo features Nintendo GameCube classics updated for Wii! New features, new experiences and, most importantly, new ways to control the games await, whether you’re new to the titles or have played the originals on GameCube. For NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, the biggest control change concerns targeting. In the GameCube original, Olimar’s target moved where he moved, which made for some difficult aiming when precious seconds mattered. But with NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin, targeting is as easy as pointing at the screen with the Wii Remote. Using the pointer capabilities of the controller not only makes it easier to move the target cursor, it gives players a precision that they could not experience previously. The Nunchuk controller is also used to play this game, with Olimar’s movements managed via the Nunchuk’s Control Stick, and most Pikmin movements and orders doled out with the Wii Remote.
